publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3777 Alex Neil: Safety of Christmas Lightsâ€”That the Parliament calls for an immediate and urgent review of the safety of Christmas lights including an assessment of the fire risk that certain brands may pose with a view to taking whatever action may be necessary to restrict the sale of any brands which are deemed to be insufficiently safe.
S2M-3777 Safety of Christmas Lights (lodged on 4 January 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*, Donald Gorrie*
